content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an error when attempting to run "generate_map.py" in the "brno_reservoir_trip" folder. I then asked my computer to browse alltrails.com for the best hiking trails in the Czech Republic. The website returned an advertisement for the AllTrails app, which provides information on hiking trails in various countries, including the Czech Republic. The app lists several hiking trails in the South Moravian region of the Czech Republic, ranging from easy to moderate difficulty, and encourages users to sign up for AllTrails+ for additional features. The app also promotes environmental conservation efforts.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo snap install alltrails"}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
